title: AMD may soon launch a new GPU, but it’s probably not the one you think
description: It's possible that AMD may reveal a new RDNA 3 GPU at Computex, but if you expected the RX 7800 XT, you might be disappointed.

title: Some Ryzen CPUs are burning up. Here’s what you can do to save yours
description: A round of reports claim AMD's latest processors have been burning up. A new BIOS update might be the thing that saves your CPU.

title: Why you’ll probably need to upgrade your PC to play Diablo IV
description: Blizzard just announced the system requirements for Diablo IV, and it looks like an unexpected upgrade might be needed.
